TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocumentPaginator extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供抽象基底類別，支援從單一文件建立多頁項目。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that supports creation of multiple-page elements from a single document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要自動背景分頁，以回應事件，例如變更的頁面大小，然後使用為基底類別。If you need automatic background repagination in response to events such as changing the page size of a , then use as your base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的多載可讓您能夠取消這個非同步作業，而不需要取消所有的非同步作業。This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations. 這個方法會引發事件。This method raises the event. 做為其中一個事件引數傳遞給事件。The is passed to the event as one of the event arguments. 下列步驟說明如何擷取以非同步的方式：The following steps illustrate how to retrieve a asynchronously: 1. 建立委派，並將它新增至通知事件。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 呼叫指定`pageNumber`需和所唯一`userState`，這會用來識別非同步事件完成。Call specifying the `pageNumber` desired and a unique `userState`, which will be used to identify the completion of the asynchronous event. 3. 當發生事件時，則會呼叫委派時比較事件的。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's . 屬性與原始`userState`參數。property with the original `userState` parameter. ( 。(The . 屬性也會比對`pageNumber`中所指定呼叫。)property will also match the `pageNumber` specified in the call.) 4. 當。When the . 屬性會比對原始 `userState`、 作業已完成，而該頁面已就緒。property matches the original `userState`, the operation is complete and the page is ready. 5. 呼叫擷取格式化。Call to retrieve the formatted .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: abstract property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前已格式化的頁面數目計數。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a count of the number of pages currently formatted

value.span: 已格式化的頁面數目計數。

span.span: A count of the number of pages that have been formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，已完成分頁和是文件中的頁面總數。If is `true`, pagination is complete and is the total number of pages in the document. 如果已`false`，分頁正在處理中和是目前已格式化的頁面 （不是總數） 的數目。If is `false`, pagination is in process and is the number of pages currently formatted (not the total). 此值可能會變更，如果或內容變更，因為這些事件會強制重新分頁。This value may change if or content changes, because those events would force a repagination.

summary.span: 文件內容變更後發生。

span.span: Occurs when the document content is changed.
